note:
I (try to) design AAA RPG inspired story driven boardgames powered by minimalistic toolboxes.

But these days I'm learning LUA on PICO-8 !

Main media :
- Computer, pen & paper
- Card, board & tokens
- Bass & effect pedals.

I love lovecraftian horror, creepypastas, backrooms, the 1960s, linguistics, poetry, the Library of Babel, procedural generation, Yggdrasill world building, fantasy, functional steam/dieselpunk, SF pirates, boardgame design, pixels, grunge, rock, metal, cold/synth wave, etc.
